common.wrong: Something went wrong, please try again later.
common.auditTip: Sensitive words do not take effect on Admin.

chat.placeholder: Ask me anything...(Shift + Enter = line break, "/" to trigger prompts)
chat.clearChatConfirm: Are you sure to clear this chat?
chat.exportImageConfirm: Are you sure to export this chat to png?
chat.turnOnContext: In the current mode, sending messages will carry previous chat records.
chat.turnOffContext: In the current mode, sending messages will not carry previous chat records.
chat.turnOnSearch: Web search has been enabled for this chat.
chat.turnOffSearch: Web search has been disabled for this chat.
chat.turnOnThink: Deep thinking has been enabled for this chat.
chat.turnOffThink: Deep thinking has been disabled for this chat.
chat.clickTurnOnContext: Click to enable sending messages will carry previous chat records.
chat.clickTurnOffContext: Click to disable sending messages will carry previous chat records.
chat.contextHelp:
The context window determines the amount of chat history from the current session that the model can reference during generation.
A reasonable context window size helps the model generate coherent and relevant text.
Avoid confusion or irrelevant output caused by referencing too much context.
Turning off the context window will cause the session to lose memory, making each question completely independent.
chat.clickTurnOnSearch: Click to enable web search for this chat.
chat.clickTurnOffSearch: Click to disable web search for this chat.
chat.searchHelp:
The model's knowledge is based on previous training data, and the learned knowledge has a cutoff date (e.g., DeepSeek-R1 training data cutoff is October 2023).
For breaking news, industry news and other time-sensitive questions, the answers are often "outdated".
After enabling web search, search engine interfaces will be called to get real-time information for the model to reference before generating results, but this will also increase response latency.
For non-time-sensitive questions, enabling web search may actually reduce answer quality due to the incorporation of latest data.
chat.clickTurnOnThink: Click to enable deep thinking for this chat.
chat.clickTurnOffThink: Click to disable deep thinking for this chat.
chat.thinkHelp:
After enabling deep thinking, the model will use more computational resources and take longer time to simulate more complex thinking chains for logical reasoning.
Suitable for complex tasks or high-requirement scenarios, such as mathematical derivations and project planning.
Daily simple queries do not need to be enabled.
chat.maxContextCount: Maximum number of messages included in the context window
chat.turnOnTools: Tool calling has been enabled for this chat.
chat.turnOffTools: Tool calling has been disabled for this chat.
chat.clickTurnOnTools: Click to enable tool calling for this chat.
chat.clickTurnOffTools: Click to disable tool calling for this chat.
chat.toolsHelp: Tool calling allows the model to use external tools, such as image generation. When enabled, the model can call image generation tools to create or edit images as needed.
chat.deleteMessageConfirm: Are you sure to delete this message?
chat.deleteHistoryConfirm: Are you sure to clear this history?
chat.clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure to clear chat history?
chat.deleteKeyConfirm: Are you sure to delete this key?

setting.globalAmount: Global Usage Amount for New User
setting.s3EndpointTip: Optional, for custom endpoints like MinIO
setting.s3CustomDomainTip: Optional, custom domain (e.g., https://cdn.example.com), files will be accessed via custom domain if configured
setting.name: Name
setting.registerReviewTip: Only email addresses with these suffixes are allowed to register on this website.
setting.loginSaltTip: Changes will invalidate all logged in
setting.auditBaiduLabelTip: English comma separated, If empty, only politics.
setting.systemMessageWithSearchResult: System message for conversations with search results
setting.systemMessageGetSearchQuery: System message for getting search query
setting.systemMessageWithSearchResultPlaceholder: System message template when with search results. Use {'{current_time}'} as placeholder for current time.
setting.systemMessageGetSearchQueryPlaceholder: System message template for generating search query word. Use {'{current_time}'} as placeholder for current time. Require LLM to return the query word in <search_query>example search query</search_query> tags or return empty <search_query></search_query> tag if not need search.
setting.info2FA: Two-step verification is an additional authentication step that enhances the security of your login experience. After enabling two-step verification, every time you log in to your account, the system will prompt you to enter a dynamic verification code.
setting.info2FAStep1Desc: Install the authentication app, for example: Google Authenticator、Microsoft Authenticator、Authy
setting.info2FAStep2Desc: Open the Authenticator App and click "Scan QR Code" to scan the QR code.
setting.info2FAStep2Tip: Note: The authenticator cannot scan the verification code? Please manually add the following account.
setting.info2FAStep3Desc: Please enter the 6-digit dynamic verification code generated by the authentication app to enable two-step verification.
setting.info2FAStep3Tip1: Note: How to turn off two-step verification?
setting.info2FAStep3Tip2: 1. After logging in, use the two-step verification on the Two-Step Verification page to disable it.
setting.info2FAStep3Tip3: 2. Contact the administrator to disable two-step verification.
setting.maxContextCount: Maximum number of messages included in the context window for default new sessions

user.deleteUserConfirm: Are you sure to delete this user? After deletion, this email can never be registered or logged in again.
user.disable2FAConfirm: Are you sure to disable 2FA for this user?
